snippet: The week before the Democratic primary, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo continues to avoid uttering the name of his Democratic opponent, Zephyr Teachout, let alone debating her.
abstract: New York Gov Andrew M Cuomo seems to be avoiding any discussion of his re-election, even as Democratic primary approaches; his primary challengers include Zephyr Teachout, law professor whose candidacy has attracted attention in part because of Cuomo's simultaneous concern about it and his refusal to acknowledge it exists.
lead_paragraph: The week before the Democratic primary, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo continues to avoid uttering the name of his Democratic opponent, Zephyr Teachout, let alone debating her.

headline.main: Cuomo Is Running but Isn’t One to Talk About It
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Is Running for a 2nd Term, but He Doesn’t Have Much to Say About It
